date.description: The date for which the analytics data is recorded.

channel_id.description: The unique identifier for the channel where the data is collected.

video_id.description: The unique identifier for the video associated with the analytics data.

live_or_on_demand.description: Indicates if the data is based on live or on-demand videos.

subscribed_status.description: Indicates whether users are subscribers when viewing videos with subtitles.

country_code.description: The country code indicating the location where the data was collected.

subtitle_language.description: The language of the subtitles for which the analytics data is provided.

views.description: The total number of views for videos with a specific subtitle language and channel.

watch_time_minutes.description: The total watch time in minutes for videos with a specific subtitle language and channel.

average_view_duration_seconds.description: The average duration in seconds that users watched a video for a specific subtitle language and channel.

average_view_duration_percentage.description: The average percentage of a video that users watched for a specific subtitle language and channel.

red_views.description: The number of views on videos with subtitles approved for advertising (Red views).

red_watch_time_minutes.description: The total watch time in minutes on videos with subtitles approved for advertising (Red watch time).
